title: Spicy Fresh Fish Tacos
steps: In a small bowl, combine cumin, coriander, paprika, and garlic powder.
Toss the shreddd fish fillets in the spice mixture.
In a large pan over medium heat, fry the fish for about 5 minutes per side.
Create the sauce: combine Greek yogurt, Sriracha sauce, and lime juice.
For each of the tortillas, layer fish, cabbage, corn, and top with sauce.
